thread.section_title: Gift Card Granny Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gift Card Granny | www.giftcardgranny.com | 4 of 12
thread.title: Sean
thread.title_full: Gift Card Granny reviewed by Sean

author: Sean
title: Sean
text: I like the collection of gift card sites and use it as a point of reference to see if I am getting the best deal. However, their rewards program needs improvement. Only 2 'coupons' to redeem rewards for and one of the sites will not do business with me. They need to add more options. Other than that, I'm happy with them.
